properties.entry: INSERT INTO ADOPT_REVIEW ( ARLIST_NO , MEM_NO , NICKNAME , AR_TITLE , AR_CONTENT ) VALUES ( 'AR-'||LPAD(SEQ_ARNO.NEXTVAL,3,0) , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( ATTACH_NO , REF_NO , PATH , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , ATTACH_LEVEL ) VALUES ( 'AT-'||LPAD(SEQ_ATNO.NEXTVAL,3,0) , 'AR-'||LPAD(SEQ_ARNO.CURRVAL,3,0) , ? , ? , ? , ? )
